IntroductionYour Role and ResponsibilitiesWho you are:You will play the role of a Big data developer and will have required Cloudera certificationWhat you’ll do:You will do development in Big data using HIVE, MapReduce, HBase, Java
You are required to develop world-class codes to meet business requirements.
You will be performing unit testing and assisting testing teams in running system & integration testing. You are also required to assist business users while UAT is being performed.
You will also be required to create and update documentations as part of standard SDLC.
You may also be required to give trainings to end users.How we’ll help you grow:You’ll have access to all the technical and management training courses you need to become the expert you want to be
You’ll learn directly from expert developers in the field; our team leads love to mentor
You have the opportunity to work in many different areas to figure out what really excites you.Required Technical and Professional ExpertiseFull time B.Tech/B.E/MCA /MS(IT) from a recognized Institution / University
3+ years of experience in Big Data
Relevant Cloudera Certifications
Experience of HIVE, MapReduce, HBase, Java etc.Preferred Technical and Professional ExpertiseKnowledge of industry standards and best practices related to data engineering
Should be a good team player.
Should be a good communicator in English language in both written and oral.
Should be having good time management and multi-tasking skills
Should be a learner.Job Details
